Dinobot 2: Acknowledged.

He sits down next to a stone formation.

Computer=
: Warning! Energy depletion too great for constant use in
current condition=
. Weapons systems auto-lockdown in ten nanocycles.
Weapons will be deactiva=
ted in order to preserve energy.

He starts reflecting on his state.

Dinob=
ot 2: This... *grunt* situation seems familiar... I shall look
deeper into =
it when I am repaired.
